rows.label: bf11070100_0010
rows.name: That village is in a dreadful state...

rows.label: bf11070100_0050
rows.name:
They say that towns burned by the Heaven's Holy
Grail have not a single speck of dust left behind.

rows.label: bf11070100_0060
rows.name:
I intend to report as much
to the mercenary group.

rows.label: bf11070100_0070
rows.name:
To think that people could do
something so awful to each other...

rows.label: bf11070100_0080
rows.name:
Now, you should get some sleep. We should
be able to meet up with Kasumi tomorrow.

rows.label: bf11070100_0100
rows.name:
I can't wait to hear
how Mother is doing.

rows.label: bf11070100_0110
rows.name:
I'm going to get breakfast
ready, then I'll sleep.

rows.label: bf11070100_0120
rows.name: Alright. Thanks for always doing this...
